en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Chongqing

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit Chongqing from tomorrow (September 8) to September 10 to attend the 2016 Annual Meeting of the Chinese Judicial Studies Association and its Second Summit on Chinese Judicial Studies.

Established by the China Association of Judges and related academic institutions, the Chinese Judicial Studies Association is a professional academic institute which mainly focuses on the studies of jurisprudence, judicial systems and practice across the strait and in the Hong Kong and Macau Special Administrative Regions. Under the theme of "Transformation in Justice in a Changing Society", the Second Summit on Chinese Judicial Studies will examine the continuation of traditional Chinese legal culture, the safeguarding of the rule of law under the Belt and Road Initiative, judicial reform and public confidence, as well as modernisation of judicial systems and justice. Mr Yuen will speak at the closing ceremony of the summit.
During his stay in Chongqing, Mr Yuen will meet with the President of the Supreme People's Court, Mr Zhou Qiang.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong in the evening on September 10.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師明日（九月八日）至九月十日訪問重慶，出席中華司法研究會2016年年會暨第二屆中華司法研究高峰論壇。
中華司法研究會是由中國法官協會和相關學術組織成立的專業學術團體，主要是研究海峽兩岸、香港和澳門的司法和法律理論、制度和實務。第二屆中華司法研究高峰論壇的主題為「變革中的社會、變革中的司法」，探討中華傳統法律文化的歷史傳承、「一帶一路」戰略的法治保障、司法改革與司法公信力，以及司法現代化及司法公正。袁國強將於論壇的閉幕儀式上致辭。
訪問重慶期間，他將與最高人民法院院長周強會面。
袁國強將於九月十日晚上返港。
